DOC.detailed_description: All patient present labor cesarean delivery eligible except : patient age 18 , contraindication regional anesthesia , advanced labor , emergency condition and/or unable understand consent process . - Data collect include : - Ultrasound depth transverse oblique sagittal view - Actual needle depth - Level placement - Number separate needle placement - Number needle redirects - Angle probe - Angle needle - Total number attempt - Pt height - Pt weight - Pt BMI - Pt age - Pt gravity/parity - Pt co-morbidities , e.g . pre-eclampsia - Procedure perform - Operator ( Attending , CA-1 , CA-2 , CA-3 , CRNA ) What currently examine correlation ultrasound depth target area vs actual needle depth
